Hi All,

I got a requirement that open the main composite window as a modal dialog. This means the third part applications need to open my WPF composite window on the top of others and disable to access others until it close.

I tried to use the ShowDialog to open the main composite window. Unfortunately looks the composite regions havenot been activated (the region adaptors didnot work at all).

Any idea?

Thanks

 Looks it's a silly question. Just realized the ShowDialog() would not return so the CAL would not load the regions through adaptors. That's the reason. I withdraw my question.

Thanks all
